doc.title: Eroica
doc.plot: To change the world, you have to eliminate it. That's what a revolutionist once said..' Wataru and Ai has come back from visiting Akira's grave. They start recalling their memory with Akira who killed himself a year ago. Akra has charisma and strong ambition which try to revolutionize his country and he is a hero for Wataru and Ai. When their each memories of Akira reveal the dark mind of human being, Akira's ghost appears in front of them and leaves the mysterious word 'EROIKA' This is the story about 'Eroika' and three personas try to change their world.
